summary: Titli, the youngest member of a car-jacking brotherhood wants to escape the family business. He and his wife form a pact to set free from their family roots. But is escape possible?
cast: Shashank Arora|Ranvir Shorey|Shivani Raghuvanshi|Amit Sial|Lalit Behl|Janav Chanana|Neetu Chanana|Raman Chanana|Nitten Chaturrvaydi|Vibha Chaudhary|Harish Chhabra|Devika|Harish Dinkar|Solanki Diwakar|Sumit Gulati|Aamir Khan|Neha Khanna|Vidushi Khanna|Sachin Khaturia|Sonu Ronjhiya|Leena Salhotra|Svati Salhotra|Kamal Sharma|Pradeep Sharma|Sarita Sharma|Prashant Singh
keywords: character name as title|vomiting|telephone call|gun|broken hand
title: Titli
